dict.acceptation: 金刚石的；菱形的；用钻石装饰的；

sent.orig: Audemars Piguet Promesse Ladies' Mini Diamond Watch 18K White Gold Pink Mother-of-Pearl Diamond Dial.
sent.trans: 爱彼普罗梅斯系列女式迷你钻石表，18K白金镶钻表壳，粉红贝母色镶钻表盘。

sent.orig: Only the diamond can cut the diamond, only the best can satisfy the best.
sent.trans: 只有钻石可以切割钻石，只有最强可以满足最强。

sent.orig: The diamond is of the highest color grading for a white diamond and clarity ranking.
sent.trans: 这颗钻石具有白钻石最高的颜色评级和净度。

sent.orig: Ultrasonic processing polishing machine is dedicated to processing natural diamond dies and man-made diamond dies.
sent.trans: 超声波加工抛光专用机是用来加工天然钻石拉丝模和人造钻石拉丝模的专用机器。

sent.orig: The two cats challenged each other for the disputed territory –it was a diamond cut diamond.
sent.trans: 两只猫为争地盘而互相挑战——真是互不相让。
